QuestData.Title: The Dreadsworn
QuestData.Description: The Klaxxi see far and hear much. They have shared their insight with me.$B$BThe Vor'thik embrace the sha, using its power to fuel their march in this false swarm. Their warriors consume tainted amber and call themselves dreadsworn.$B$BThere is no future for them. They are waste which needs disposing.$B$BAnd YOU will begin that process for us when you reach Kypari Vor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 6 Vor'thik Dreadsworn at Kypari Vor.
QuestData.RewardText: In disciplined hands, the spear is the perfect weapon. Only the weak would augment it with sorcery.$B$BAnd we have no need for the weak.
